resources.string: The value of days must be an integer from 0 to 99!
The value of hours must be an integer from 0 to 23!
The value of minutes must be an integer from 0 to 59!
The value of litres must be an integer from 0 to 99!
The value of millilitres must be an integer from 0 to 999!
The password length must be greater or equal to 6 characters.
The password must contain no whitespace character.
The password must contain at least one digit.
The password must contain at least one lower case character.
The password must contain at least one upper case character.
Could not get the entered values from the water volume input!
[NOT PRODUCTION] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse et laoreet. [NOT PRODUCTION]
The Bluetooth connection was successfully established.
Unable to connect to the device via Bluetooth connection.
Access to the device configuration was obtained successfully.
The device could not be accessed.
The device\'s network settings have been successfully updated.
The device failed to update the network settings. Check the correctness of the entered data.
The device pairing has been successfully completed. Now it remains to setup your new device. To continue, click "next".
Incorrect username or password was entered.
The user with this email is already registered.
The authorization token is not accepted.
The application cannot work correctly due to the lack of necessary permissions. Please give the app the necessary permissions.
Unable to connect to the internet, please check your internet connection and retry again.
Checking the connection to the server.
Unable to connect to the server, please retry again or come back later.
The connection to the internal database is required but could not be established, please try to reinstall the application.
Establishing a connection with the repositories.
Failed to establish connections with repositories, please restart the application.
Failed to upload internal data, please restart the application.
An error occurred during the loading. Try restarting the application, if the error continues to appear, then reinstall the application.
This device does not support Bluetooth. Please install the application on a device with a Bluetooth module.
The application does not have permissions to control Bluetooth. Please give the app permissions to control Bluetooth.
The application does not have location permissions, therefore it cannot search and connect to devices via Bluetooth. Please give the app location permissions.
The application does not have full location permissions, therefore it cannot search any devices via Bluetooth. Please give the app full location permissions.
Bluetooth is turned off, although it was expected that it was turned on. Please turn on Bluetooth and try again.
An unexpected error occurred while turning on the Bluetooth.
An unexpected error occurred while searching devices via Bluetooth.
An unexpected error occurred when connecting the selected device.
The data could not be transmitted because the Bluetooth connection is not established.
The soil moisture sensor shows a high value, additional permission is required for watering.

No networks found for the chart diagram
No devices found for the chart diagram
You are going to delete this network. After this action, all watering schedules from this network will be erased. Are you sure?
You are going to delete this device. After that you won\'t be able to control it and will disappear from the list of your devices. However, you will be able to add it again. Are you sure?
You are going to delete this schedule. After this action, all devices of this schedule will stop watering according to the schedule. Are you sure?
If you save this device without setting it a watering schedule, it will not perform automatic watering.
If you add this device without setting it a watering schedule, it will not perform automatic watering. However, you will be able to add a schedule later through the settings.
Insufficient volume of water for manual watering, the volume should be more than 10 ml. Please enter the correct volume.
Insufficient volume of water or period. The volume of water should be more than 10 ml and period of watering should be more than 1 minute. Please enter the correct values.
If you save this schedule without attached devices, it will not be able to perform automatic watering.
If you create this schedule without attached devices, it will not be able to perform automatic watering. However, you will be able to add a schedule later through the settings.
Sensors showed high soil moisture of the plant. Are you sure you want to continue watering?
Are you sure you want to do a\n
Are you sure you want to exit the app?
Are you sure you want to completely shutdown the app? In the future, you will need more time to start the application.
During the pairing of the new device, Bluetooth is required to be turned on, after pairing it can be turned off. Turn on Bluetooth?
We are establishing a connection with the device, please wait, it won\'t take much time.
The internet connection is lost. The application cannot work without the Internet. Please turn on the Internet.
The connection to the server is lost. The application cannot work without a connection to the server.
A plant in a smart pot
A pointer to the add button, which is below
Requested device with id: %1$s was not found!
Requested device with hardware id: %1$s was not found!
Requested network with id: %1$s was not found!
Requested schedule with id: %1$s was not found!
The user with username: %1$s was not found!
